node.name: lexica
node.description: 📖 Your ultimate book reading companion! Upload PDFs, track difficult words, find meanings, synonyms & examples! 🚀✨ Store covers in the cloud ☁️, access your books anywhere 📚, and enhance your vocabulary effortlessly! 🔥📖💡

node.name: thors_weather_watch
node.description: ⚡️ Thor's Weather Watch ⛈️ – A sleek Next.js app that brings you real-time weather updates! 🌍 Get forecasts, temperature, wind speed, air quality & more for any location or use geolocation for instant results! 🌦️⚡ Stay ahead of the storm with Thor’s power! 🔥🌪️

node.name: MiniUserBot
node.description: 🤖 MiniUserBot ⚡ – A powerful Telegram userbot built with Python & Telethon! 🚀 Automate replies, manage groups, fetch images, Google search in chat, delete messages, kick users & more—all with simple commands! ��⚙️ Take control of your chats like a pro! 💬⚡

node.name: .dotfiles
node.description: 🔧 Sujeet's Linux Dotfiles | Custom Neovim, Hyprland, and CLI Setup 🖥️  🔥 Personalized Arch Linux environment with a focus on minimalism, efficiency, and aesthetics. Includes: ⚡ Neovim (LazyVim, custom keymaps & plugins) ⚡ Tiling Window Manager (Hyprland) ⚡ Zsh (aliases, functions) ⚡ Git, CLI tools for a smooth workflow

node.name: easy-youtubedl
node.description: 🎬 easy-youtubedl 🚀 – A simple & interactive Bash script for using yt-dlp with ease! 🎶📺 Download videos, music & playlists effortlessly from YouTube & more—no complex commands, just smooth downloads! ⚡💾🎧
